mapper.insert: INSERT INTO lagarto_customer (board_cd, title, ctnt, ctnt_img, iuser) VALUES (${board_cd}, #{title}, #{ctnt}, #{ctnt_img}, ${iuser})
mapper.select: SELECT A.* , B.nickname, C.title AS productTitle, C.iboard FROM lagarto_customer A INNER JOIN lagarto_user B ON A.iuser = B.iuser LEFT JOIN auction C ON A.product_cd = C.iboard WHERE A.board_cd = ${board_cd} ORDER BY A.iboard DESC
SELECT A.*, B.nickname, C.board_nm FROM lagarto_customer A LEFT JOIN lagarto_user B ON A.iuser = B.iuser LEFT JOIN customer_board_type C ON A.board_cd = C.board_cd WHERE A.iboard = ${iboard}
